item.title: Waymo Announces Robotaxi Launch In Five More Cities
item.description: The company is looking to open rides to the public across the cities next year.

item.title: Anthropic Commits $30 Billion To Expand Azure Capacity – Nvidia, Microsoft To Invest $15 Billion In The AI Startup
item.description: Anthropic and Nvidia stated they would collaborate on the design and fine-tuning of AI models to improve performance, efficiency, and cost.

item.title: OLMA Stock Doubles After Roche Cancer Drug Trial Yields Positive Results
item.description: Roche was evaluating Giredestrant as an adjuvant endocrine treatment for people with certain types of early-stage breast cancer.

item.title: Why Did DGNX Stock Surge 13% Today?
item.description: The collaboration with EVIDENT aims to integrate Diginex’s environmental, social, and governance and sustainability reporting tools directly into the ...

item.title: PDD Holdings’ Q3 Revenue Growth Slowed Amid Competitive Shifts, Market Uncertainty
item.description: The company’s third-quarter total revenue was RMB 108.27 billion, up 9% from RMB 99.35 billion in the same quarter of 2024.
